article: max-width: 960px; margin: 0px auto; padding: 32px; background: #ffffff; color-scheme: light; color: #1f2328; font-family: Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji"; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.5; overflow-wrap: break-word; overflow-x: hidden;
h1: margin-top: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.25; color: #e16a7c; padding-bottom: 0.3em; font-size: 2em; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(209, 217, 224, 0.7);
h2: margin-top: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.25; color: #e16a7c; font-size: 1.5em; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(209, 217, 224, 0.7);
h3: margin-top: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.25; color: #e16a7c; font-size: 1.25em;
h4: margin-top: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.25; color: #e16a7c; font-size: 1em;
h5: margin-top: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.25; color: #e16a7c; font-size: 0.875em;
h6: margin-top: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.25; color: #e16a7c; font-size: 0.85em;
code_block_wrapper: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 1rem; background-color: #eef1f3; border: 1px solid #dddddd; font-size: 13px; line-height: 19px; overflow: auto; padding: 6px 10px;
code: margin: 0px; padding: 3px 5px; background-color: #eef1f3; border: none; overflow-wrap: normal; max-width: initial; display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: initial; line-height: inherit; color: #000000;
img: max-width: 450px; height: auto; display: block; margin: 1rem auto;
ul: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 1rem; list-style-type: disc; padding-left: 2em; list-style-position: outside;
